attributes.action: Stop the political parties from using Personal  Information from the Electoral Register
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Political parties are using Personal Information obtained from the electoral register (or copies of it) to send personally addressed letters and to make phone calls for their electoral campaign.
This type of contact is not welcome and steers us away from the political parties which adopt these practices - We want the ability to opt out.
